title: Track Fault on East West Line

title_translations.ms: Pengesanan Kesalahan di Laluan Timur Barat

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train services from #JurongEast to #Redhill have resumed.
[EWL] UPDATE: Additional train travel time reduced to 5mins from #JurongEast to #Redhill due to a track fault. Train svc is available.
[EWL] UPDATE: Additional train travel time reduced to 10mins from #JurongEast to #Redhill due to a track fault. Train svc is available.
[EWL] UPDATE: Pls add 15mins train travel time from #JurongEast to #Redhill due to a track fault at #Redhill. Train svc is available.
